word_mean: 反粒子：互为物质和反物质的两个粒子之一，两者相撞即归湮灭，例如电子和正电子

sentence.Network_en: The particle - antiparticle concept is one of the most fascinating ones in physics.
sentence.Network_cn: 粒子和 反 粒子是物理学中最迷惑人的概念之一.

sentence.Network_en: This property, often called " helicity,'serves to differentiate the neutrino from its antiparticle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种性质通常称为 “ 螺旋性”, 可以用来区分中微子和它的反粒子.

sentence.Network_en: This sister particle is usually called an antiparticle.
sentence.Network_cn: 姐妹粒子通常称为反粒子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文2011年7月3日 -  反物质武器属于第四代核武器,使用后没有放射性沾染等核污染,可视作 “ 常规武器 ” 的核武器。反物(antimatter)是由反粒子(antiparticle)构成的物质.
anion 　阴离子antiparticle 　反离子antiproton 　反质子

list.abs: 2008年5月10日 -  antiparticle beam || 反粒子束 antiphase || 反相位,反相,逆相 antiphase boundary || 反相边界 antiphase domain || 反相畴 antiphase relay ||.
This sister particle is usually called antiparticle ., 姐妹粒子通常称为反粒子.
When a particle and its antiparticle meet they can mutually annihilate and produce energy ., 当粒子和它的反粒子相遇时 , 它们会发生湮灭并产生能量.
particle accelerator 粒子加速器particle antiparticle conjugation 正反粒子共轭particle aspect of matter 物质的粒子观点

means.word_mean: 1. a particle that has the same mass as another particle but has opposite values for its other properties; interaction of a particle and its antiparticle results in annihilation and the production of radiant energy
